subject: Problem with mail feature of ant
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to automate building Junit tests and email the test- results (html format). I am able to get email but it also contains lot of crap in addition
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to automate building Junit tests and email the test-
results (html format).

I am able to get email but it also contains lot of crap in addition
to attached test-result. I want to get rid of that and I have tried
a lot but it never goes away. Please help!

Following is the part of build.xml -->

<target name="mail" depends="junit">
<mail mailhost="mail.XXXXX.XXX(masking this)"
subject="Test build" messagemimetype="html" files="${junit-
reports}/junit-noframes.html">
<from address="pradeep.yadav@..."/>
<replyto
address="pradeep.yadav@..."
<to
address="pradeep_3diitr@..."/>
<message>MyCompany : Junit Test
Results</message>
</mail>
</target>

I thought I should only get junit-noframes.html as body of email
message but I get a lot of crap before that.

Has anyone faced the same problem?

Please help.

Thanks and Regards,

Pradeep
